LanguageData.Charged.label: charge
LanguageData.Charged.description: The charged particle coating disrupts armor and tissue in equal measure.
LanguageData.ChargedAP.label: concentrated charge
LanguageData.ChargedAP.description: Focuses charged particles around the tip of the core for improved armor penetration at the cost of stopping power.
LanguageData.Ionized.label: ion charge
LanguageData.Ionized.description: Designed to combat mechanoids, the round creates an electrical current on impact, disrupting electronic systems temporarily.
LanguageData.IncendiaryFuel.label: incendiary
LanguageData.IncendiaryFuel.description: Filled with incendiary agent that ignites after impact.
LanguageData.NapalmFuel.label: jellied chemfuel
LanguageData.NapalmFuel.description: Highly flammable liquid, burns over time and catches nearby objects on fire.
LanguageData.JelliedPrometheumFuel.label: jellied prometheum
LanguageData.JelliedPrometheumFuel.description: Advanced pyrophoric compound in gel-form. Self-ignites on contact with air, sticks to skin and seeps into openings, burning even mechanoids.
LanguageData.ThermobaricFuel.label: thermobaric
LanguageData.ThermobaricFuel.description: Filled with high-explosive aerosol that causes a large explosion and ignites flammable materials.
LanguageData.FoamFuel.label: foam
LanguageData.FoamFuel.description: Special round designed for civilian fire-fighting purposes. Filled with fire-retardant foam to suppress fires in a large area.
LanguageData.Antigrain.label: antigrain warhead
LanguageData.Antigrain.description: A tiny ultra-tech warhead usually used by spacecraft or glitterworld war machines. Powered by a grain of antimatter, it creates a huge explosion and starts fires around the target.
LanguageData.RadiationIonising.label: radioactive (ionising)
LanguageData.RadiationIonising.description: Contains ionising gamma radiation that significantly impairs consciousness, and is a carcinogen.
LanguageData.ForsakenArrow.label: forsaken arrow
LanguageData.ForsakenArrow.description: Designed to be fired from a forsaken bow.
LanguageData.Plasma.label: Plasma
LanguageData.Plasma.description: Highly-energized ionized gas capable of devastating burn effects.
LanguageData.RailgunSabot.label: Railgun sabot
LanguageData.RailgunSabot.description: Uses a discarding sabot to fire an undersized projectile at higher muzzle velocities, greatly improving armor penetration.
LanguageData.FullMetalJacket.label: full metal jacket
LanguageData.FullMetalJacket.description: The soft lead core is encased in a harder metal coating, combining a medium amount of stopping power and armor penetration.
LanguageData.ArmorPiercing.label: armor-piercing
LanguageData.ArmorPiercing.description: Features a hardened steel penetrator core for increased armor penetration.
LanguageData.HollowPoint.label: hollow point
LanguageData.HollowPoint.description: A hollowed out tip causes the bullet to expand on impact, increasing tissue damage at the cost of armor penetration.
LanguageData.Sabot.label: armor-piercing discarding sabot
LanguageData.Sabot.description: Uses a discarding sabot to fire an undersized projectile at higher muzzle velocities, greatly improving armor penetration.
LanguageData.IncendiaryAP.label: armor-piercing incendiary
LanguageData.IncendiaryAP.description: Filled with an incendiary compound that ignites on impact, doing additional damage and increasing armor penetration.
LanguageData.ExplosiveAP.label: armor-piercing high-explosive
LanguageData.ExplosiveAP.description: Filled with high-explosives that detonate on impact for additional damage.
LanguageData.TranqNonLethal.label: tranquilizer
LanguageData.TranqNonLethal.description: Special round designed for non-lethal engagements of targets. Filled with fast-acting sedatives and tipped with a hypodermic needle.
LanguageData.GrenadeHE.label: high-explosive
LanguageData.GrenadeHE.description: The high-explosive charge detonates on impact, scattering lethal shell fragments in a large area.
LanguageData.GrenadeEMP.label: EMP
LanguageData.GrenadeEMP.description: Creates an electro-magnetic burst on impact, temporarily disrupting electronic systems and Mechanoids.
LanguageData.GrenadeIncendiary.label: Incendiary
LanguageData.GrenadeIncendiary.description: Filled with incendiary agent. The agent is dispersed on impact, covering the area in flames.
LanguageData.Smoke.label: Smoke
LanguageData.Smoke.description: Filled with a smoke-producing agent. Explodes on impact to generate a thick smokescreen.
LanguageData.BallistaBolt.label: Ballista Bolt
LanguageData.BallistaBolt.description: A steel tip attached to a long and fletched wooden pole, packing a very strong punch against scarcely armored targets.
LanguageData.BallistaBoltHeavy.label: Heavy Ballista Bolt
LanguageData.BallistaBoltHeavy.description: Fitted with a heavy steel tip to defeat the toughest of targets.
LanguageData.BallistaBoltArmorPiercing.label: Armor-Piercing Ballista Bolt
LanguageData.BallistaBoltArmorPiercing.description: Fitted with a streamlined and hardened steel tip to punch through armored targets.
LanguageData.TomahawkLAM.label: Tomahawk Missile
LanguageData.TomahawkLAM.description: Long-range, all-weather, jet-powered, surface-launched subsonic cruise missile designed to attack land targets.
LanguageData.Javelin.label: javelin
LanguageData.Javelin.description: A heavy steel tip attached to a long wooden pole, packing a very strong punch against scarcely armored targets.
LanguageData.Kunai.label: kunai
LanguageData.Kunai.description: Originally a Japanese farming instrument, similar in use to a hand-shovel, the kunai is a multi-purpose tool useful in both ranged and melee combat.
LanguageData.StoneArrow.label: stone arrow
LanguageData.StoneArrow.description: A sharpened stone is attached as an arrow head. Cuts exposed tissue fairly well but is ineffective against any kind of armor.
LanguageData.SteelArrow.label: steel arrow
LanguageData.SteelArrow.description: The arrow head is made from steel to enhance armor penetration.
LanguageData.PlasteelArrow.label: plasteel arrow
LanguageData.PlasteelArrow.description: Fitted with a plasteel head to maximize armor penetration.
LanguageData.StoneSlingBullet.label: stone sling bullet
LanguageData.StoneSlingBullet.description: A streamlined stone designed to fly far and hit hard. Not particularly effective against armor.
LanguageData.SteelSlingBullet.label: steel sling bullet
LanguageData.SteelSlingBullet.description: A refined sling bullet made out of steel to enhance armor penetration.
LanguageData.PlasteelSlingBullet.label: plasteel sling bullet
LanguageData.PlasteelSlingBullet.description: A highly-refined sling bullet made out of plasteel to maximize penetration.
LanguageData.StoneCrossbowBolt.label: stone crossbow bolt
LanguageData.StoneCrossbowBolt.description: A sharpened stone is attached to a wooden shaft. Cuts exposed tissue fairly well but isn't very effective against armor.
LanguageData.SteelCrossbowBolt.label: steel crossbow bolt
LanguageData.SteelCrossbowBolt.description: The head of the crossbow bolt is made from steel to enhance armor penetration.
LanguageData.PlasteelCrossbowBolt.label: plasteel crossbow bolt
LanguageData.PlasteelCrossbowBolt.description: The head of the crossbow bolt is made from plasteel to maximize armor penetration.
LanguageData.VenomArrow.label: venom arrow
LanguageData.VenomArrow.description: The arrow head is made from steel and coated in toxin.
LanguageData.FlameArrow.label: flame arrow
LanguageData.FlameArrow.description: Steel open cage arrowhead containing incendiary components for setting targets alight.
LanguageData.RocketHEAT.label: high-explosive anti-tank
LanguageData.RocketHEAT.description: Shaped charge warhead. Detonates on impact, creating a super-heated stream of molten metal that punches through enemy armor.
LanguageData.RocketThermobaric.label: thermobaric
LanguageData.RocketThermobaric.description: Disperses and subsequently ignites a fuel-air explosive mix, creating a powerful explosion and potentially igniting flammable objects.
LanguageData.RocketFrag.label: fragmentation
LanguageData.RocketFrag.description: Designed to explode into a cloud of deadly shrapnel, shredding soft targets in a large area.
LanguageData.RocketHE.label: High Explosive
LanguageData.RocketHE.description: Designed to explode, damaging targets in a large area.
LanguageData.BuckShot.label: buckshot
LanguageData.BuckShot.description: Filled with several buckshot pellets which spread in a tight pattern.
LanguageData.BirdShot.label: birdshot
LanguageData.BirdShot.description: Filled with a large number of very small birdshot pellets which spread over a large area.
LanguageData.Slug.label: slug
LanguageData.Slug.description: The single large projectile offers better damage potential and armor penetration compared to regular shot but is inaccurate over large distances.
LanguageData.Beanbag.label: beanbag
LanguageData.Beanbag.description: Non-lethal rubber round originally designed for riot control. Accurate over short ranges only. Designed to temporarily incapacitate a target, it does not cause bleeding or damage to internal organs.
LanguageData.ElectroSlug.label: EMP
LanguageData.ElectroSlug.description: Designed to combat mechanoids, the projectile is accurate over short range only and delivers an electro-magnetic pulse on impact, temporarily disabling electronics.
